title: Hiver <> Genesis Media Limited - AI Feature Commercials

signals.problem_statement: The legal team needs a tool that can review contracts and highlight areas that do not align with their internal guidelines.
signals.suggested_solution: An AI feature that checks agreements against organizational norms and provides suggestions for changes.
signals.context: Legal team handling contract reviews, primarily using email for requests.

signals.problem_statement: The current AI compose feature is underutilized by team members, limiting its effectiveness.
signals.context: One user finds AI compose helpful, but others do not engage with it.

signals.problem_statement: The team lacks a centralized task management system, leading to inefficiencies in handling tasks from various sources.
signals.suggested_solution: Integration of task management features into Hiver to better manage tasks from emails and compliance.
signals.context: Tasks are managed individually without a central system, leading to operational challenges.

signals.problem_statement: The legal team requires a way to structure incoming requests more effectively to improve task management.
signals.context: Requests are currently handled through email without a structured approach.
